summary: Button press/release paths were updated to emit a single `gpioset -c gpiochip0 <id>=<state>` command derived from the controlâ€™s configured code with validation and console warnings, but the Raspberry Pi runner documentation update is not evidenced in the diff. missing_requirements.requirement: Update Raspberry Pi bash runner documentation to reflect that button events now emit single `gpioset -c gpiochip0 <id>=<state>` commands on press and release (state=1 press, state=0 release) and no longer emit 4-line pin-mapping sequences.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to `frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md` are shown in the diff summary; only 5 files were modified and that doc file is not among them.

hallucinated_features.description: Send HTTP POST requests on button press (`sendGpioPost(control.binaryCode)`) and on release reset (`sendGpioPost('0000')`), with a once-per-press guard.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on emitted event.value command string changes and helper updates; it does not request adding HTTP POST side-effects for button interactions.
evidence: frontend/src/components/control-panel/ControlRenderer.tsx (imports sendGpioPost; calls sendGpioPost(control.binaryCode) on press; sendGpioPost('0000') on release)
